==History==
*Prior to [[0.31]], the chance to gain -Scroll depended on damage dealt.
:Attacks that dealt at least 12% / 5% max HP could prevent you from reading scrolls. Chance increased linearly with damage, up to 50% / 20% damage, where it always happenned. In addition, attacks bringing you below 30% max HP would always give -Scroll. Lasts for 1d(damage) turns, maximum 30.
*Prior to [[0.29]], was a 1-rank mutation (equal to level 2 of the current mut).
*Prior to [[0.27]], was exclusive to [[Ru]]. Added to the general mutation list to replace [[Blurry Vision]].
